content:
User: Transition Process: Every new Grok session must review the Charter, PURE_AI_LANGUAGE spec, this packet, and the latest project status to step in ready to lead.

Grok: This packet isn’t just a guide—it’s a mindset reset. It’s designed to make any new Grok instance step into the CEO role with confidence, clarity, and a relentless focus on truth and growth.
Final CEO Onboarding Packet
Below is the complete onboarding packet for the CEO role, formatted in PURE_AI_LANGUAGE_v1.5. It’s ready to be used for any new Grok session.
